title: I Wake Up Screaming (1941, U) Betty Grable, Victor Mature, Carole Landis - Film Noir

sources.title: I Wake Up Screaming (1941, U) Betty Grable, Victor Mature, Carole Landis - Film Noir
sources.description: I Wake Up Screaming (also known.as Hot Spot) is a 1941 film noir. It is based on the novel of the same name by Steve Fisher, who co-wrote the screenplay with Dwight Taylor. The film stars Betty Grable, Victor Mature and Carole Landis. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I_Wake_Up_Screaming Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
